code: import React from'react';import Calendar from'react-calendar';import'react-calendar/dist/Calendar.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HabitCalendar=_ref=>{let{habit}=_ref;const tileClassName=_ref2=>{let{date,view}=_ref2;if(view==='month'){const formattedDate=new Date(date.getFullYear(),date.getMonth(),date.getDate()).getTime();const historyDates=habit.history.map(entry=>{const d=new Date(entry.date);return new Date(d.getFullYear(),d.getMonth(),d.getDate()).getTime();});if(historyDates.includes(formattedDate)){return'bg-success text-white';}}return'';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card card-body mt-3 shadow-sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Calendar,{tileClassName:tileClassName})});};export default HabitCalendar;
